segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing, the water is overflowing and the kids are being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how the kids are able to reach the cookie jar without being noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy is stretching to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really surprised the woman hasn't noticed the water or the kids yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hoping to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they're going to be able to keep this up before they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle, and she's just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really amazed at how calm she is with all this chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one has noticed what's happening yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
